General.Name: Nextdoor Holdings Inc
General.Description: Nextdoor Holdings, Inc. operates a neighborhood network that connects neighbors, businesses, and public services in the United States and internationally. It enables small and mid-sized businesses, large brands, public agencies, and nonprofits to receive information, give and get help, and build connections with neighborhood stakeholders. The company is headquartered in San Francisco, California.
General.Address: 420 Taylor Street, San Francisco, CA, United States, 94102
